entry.title: Readit
entry.summary: These past couple of weeks, in the limited free time that I have while doing this course, I have been building a reddit clone. Way back in the beginning of the course, when we were learning about the basics of rails routes, we created a barebones blog app, which the class called Readit.
entry.content:
These past couple of weeks, in the limited free time that I have while doing this course, I have been building a reddit clone. Way back in the beginning of the course, when we were learning about the basics of rails routes, we created a barebones blog app, which the class called Readit.

class Hello
  puts foo
    "I am a code segment!"

end
